content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
add a button that says submit

Okay, here's an example HTML code for a submit button:

```html
<input type="submit" value="Submit">
```

You can customize the button styling using CSS.
add a button that says hello world

To add a button that says "Hello World", you can use HTML code as follows:

```html
<button>Hello World</button>
```

Alternatively, you can use a button element in JavaScript like this:

```javascript
let button = document.createElement("button");
button.innerHTML = "Hello World";
```

Either of these options will create a button that displays the text "Hello World".
